REQUIREMENT.TITLE: Clean, reversible, installation
REQUIREMENT.RATIONALE: A clean, reversible, installation allows users to successfully manage (deploy, and remove) applications on their system.

REQUIREMENT.TITLE: Install to the correct folders by default
REQUIREMENT.RATIONALE: Windows provides specific locations in the file system to store programs and software components, shared application data, and application data specific to a user.

REQUIREMENT.TITLE: Digitally sign files and drivers
REQUIREMENT.RATIONALE: An Authenticode digital signature allows users to be sure that the software is genuine. It also allows detection if a file has been tampered with e.g. infected by a virus.

REQUIREMENT.TITLE: Support x64 versions of Windows
REQUIREMENT.RATIONALE: To maintain compatibility with 64-bit versions of Windows, it is necessary that applications should natively support 64-bit or at minimum 32-bit Windows based applications to run seamlessly on 64-bit.

REQUIREMENT.TITLE: Do not block installation or application launch based on OS version check
REQUIREMENT.RATIONALE: Applications must not perform version checks for equality (== 5.1). If you need a specific feature, check whether the feature is available. If you need Windows XP, check for Windows XP or later (>= 5.1), This way, your detection code will continue to work on future versions of Windows. Driver installers and uninstall modules should never check the OS version.

REQUIREMENT.TITLE: Follow User Account Control (UAC) guidelines
REQUIREMENT.RATIONALE: Most applications do not require administrator privileges at run time, and should be just fine running as a standard-user. Windows applications must have a manifest (embedded or external) to define its execution level that tells OS the privileges needed to run the application.

REQUIREMENT.TITLE: Adhere to Restart Manager messages
REQUIREMENT.RATIONALE: In a critical shutdown, applications that return FALSE to WM_QUERYENDSESSION will be sent WM_ENDSESSION and closed, while those that time out in response to WM_QUERYENDSESSION will be terminated.

REQUIREMENT.TITLE: Do not load Services and Drivers in Safe Mode
REQUIREMENT.RATIONALE: By default, most drivers and services that did not come preinstalled with Windows are not started in Safe Mode. They should remain disabled unless they are needed for basic operations of the system or for diagnostic and recovery purposes.

REQUIREMENT.TITLE: Support multiuser sessions
REQUIREMENT.RATIONALE: Windows users should be able to run concurrent sessions without conflict or disruption. Applications must ensure that when running in multiple sessions either locally or remotely, the normal functionality of the application should not be impacted. Application settings and data files should not be persisted across users. A user’s privacy and preferences should be isolated to the user’s session.

REQUIREMENT.TITLE: Eliminate Application Failures
REQUIREMENT.RATIONALE: Application failures such as crashes and hangs are a major disruption to users and cause frustration. Eliminating such failures improves application stability and reliability, and overall, provides users with a better application experience.

TEST.NAME: Do not install executables that crash or hang during the testing process
TEST.DESCRIPTION: Do not crash or hang during the testing process.

REQUIREMENT.TITLE: Do not depend on Windows compatibility fixes
REQUIREMENT.RATIONALE: When Windows detects that an application has operated in an incompatible manner, it applies a compatibility fix that causes the application to behave correctly, ensuring a positive user experience. Applications should not rely on this behavior since it is only provided to allow legacy applications to work correctly on Windows.

REQUIREMENT.TITLE: Metro style App Test Failure
REQUIREMENT.RATIONALE: The package manifest was missing one or more required attributes.

TEST.NAME: Metro style App manifest must include valid entries for all required fields
TEST.DESCRIPTION: Metro style App manifest must include valid entries for all required fields.

REQUIREMENT.TITLE: Do not disable Windows security features
REQUIREMENT.RATIONALE: An application should not change the default Windows security settings.

REQUIREMENT.TITLE: Opt into Windows security features
REQUIREMENT.RATIONALE: Applications must opt-into Windows security features.

TEST.NAME: Binary Analyzer
TEST.DESCRIPTION: Analysis of security features enabled on binaries

REQUIREMENT.TITLE: Use of Supported Platform APIs
REQUIREMENT.RATIONALE: The application should only refer to the APIs allowed by the Windows SDK for Metro style Apps.

TEST.NAME: Supported APIs
TEST.DESCRIPTION: Metro style App must only use supported platform APIs.

REQUIREMENT.TITLE: Launch time performance
REQUIREMENT.RATIONALE: The application should have a fast and responsive launch experience while consuming a reasonable amount of system resources (CPU, File IO, Memory etc.) to enable fast switching and multitasking between previously unopened applications.

TEST.NAME: Performance Launch
TEST.DESCRIPTION: Application should have a responsive launch time with reasonable CPU, File IO and Memory usage

MESSAGE.TEXT: Infrastructure Error: Failure occurred while processing application App. Please consider re-running the test and avoid interacting with the application while tests are running.

Exception: Infrastructure Error: Failure occurred during testing, Error code -2147024713 occurred while running C:\Program Files\Windows Kits\8.0\App Certification Kit\..\Windows Performance Toolkit\xperf.exe. Please consider re-running the test and avoid interacting with the application while tests are running.

REQUIREMENT.TITLE: Suspend performance
REQUIREMENT.RATIONALE: The application should have a fast and responsive suspend experience while consuming a reasonable amount of system resources (CPU, File IO, Memory etc.) and making sure that resources are released in a performant manner.

TEST.NAME: Performance Suspend
TEST.DESCRIPTION: Application should have a responsive suspend with reasonable CPU and File IO usage

MESSAGE.TEXT: Application App has a suspend time of 0.058 secs.
Application App has CPU utilization of 11.2 percent. CPU utilization of 50 percent or higher can significantly degrade performance for Application Launch/Suspend.
Application App issues File I/O of 0.273 MB. Issuing File I/O of 20 MB or higher can significantly degrade performance for Application Launch/Suspend.

REQUIREMENT.TITLE: Test Appx Manifest Resources
REQUIREMENT.RATIONALE: The Appx Package Manifest should have valid resources defined in the resources.pri file, as per the Appx Packaging Specification and Appx Manifest Schema.

TEST.NAME: Appx Manifest Resources Validation
TEST.DESCRIPTION: The package should have valid resources defined in the resources.pri file.

REQUIREMENT.TITLE: Debug App Check
REQUIREMENT.RATIONALE: The App should not install any debug binaries.

TEST.NAME: The App should not install any debug binaries.
TEST.DESCRIPTION: The App should not install any debug binaries.
